sentences.sContent: When I returned to Oxford in the fall , following a spate of summer rioting in Eastern cities.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I returned to Oxford in the fall , following a spate of summer rioting in Eastern cities.
sentences.sCn: 美国东部城市夏天发生了洪水般的暴乱。当我在秋天回到牛津大学后。

synos.tran: 洪水；一阵；大雨；突然迸发

trans.tranCn: 许多， 大量； 暴涨， 发洪水
